website_summaries.verdict: These glamorous Disney princess figurines are the perfect toy for kids who enjoy the Disney princess movies.
pros: Comes with decently sized figurines that are extremely detailed
Doll's clothing is adorned with sparkles – which kids love
Includes 5 alluring princess figurines, featuring beloved Disney characters
Made for kiddos ages 3 years old and up
cons: Glitter on dolls may shed from time to time

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Decent craftsmanship. Although I expected more attention to detail and the structural integrity for some of the members are suspect. However, for the price, one shouldn't expect too much. In terms of value, I think I got what I paid. My 3 year old loved the collection for about couple of days and is now interested in other things.
customer_reviews.author: Deconstronist Architect

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Princess Fun
customer_reviews.text: Slightly larger than I expected, even better than the smaller ones we already have. Granddaughters were super excited to see these figures sparkle with glitter paint on dresses. The girls spend hours in make believe land playing with the 2 sets of princesses we have! Wish they were not made in China, though.
customer_reviews.author: Favorite Gma

customer_reviews.title: They are really cute and the details are very nice..
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed with princesses, so on her birthday I decided that I was going to put these princesses on top of her cake... When she saw the princesses she didn't even wanted to eat the cake, all she wanted was to play with them. They are really cute and the details are very nice... I washed them twice already and they are still perfect. What a nice surprise!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and durable
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the fact that the figures are very neatly made and are quite durable. My 3 year old sister has played with them and overall they have only chipped the slightest amount. Like you can barely tell them have been used. And the glitter, it stays on and doesn’t make a mess. These are totally worth it. Great product
customer_reviews.author: YC123

customer_reviews.title: Each one is very glittery and the girls loved them. Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I put one of each of these in my daughter's party favor bags for her birthday, and they were a hit! Each one is very glittery and the girls loved them. Nice quality, they don't look like botched Disney characters like so many figurines do.
customer_reviews.author: CLBoff

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY GORGEOUS
customer_reviews.text: OMG! great quality princesses look just like the cartoon. What a lovely toy!! I found myself wishing being a kid and keeping them for myself. LOL. Accesible since kids don't take care so much about toys and get bored easily. Loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana P.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and glittery - larger size than expected
customer_reviews.text: These are much prettier and higher quality than I expected. They are very glittery. I got them to put in Easter eggs and they were too large for that, but we kept them anyway because they are really beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toys for a little one
customer_reviews.text: Perfect toys for a little one. Big enough for little hands but small enough to be cherished and carried around. Sparkles don't get anywhere, just makes the Hubby happy. I'd recommend. Great set of figurines.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia V.

customer_reviews.title: but the detail is much better than other companies
customer_reviews.text: My daughter lives these. Cinderella and Aurora's faces look a little off, but the detail is much better than other companies.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They were bigger than I expected but went well with the cake. My daughter likes them. Faces were painted well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old granddaughter loved them! Nuff said. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ladygold

customer_reviews.title: They looked really good.
customer_reviews.text: Used them for toppers on my nieces birthday cake. She was so excited. They looked really good.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette M.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice
customer_reviews.text: The figures were more designed as decoration rather than ply figures. Also, there was a price tag on the box of $14.25 and I was charged $32.00. They may have been worth the 14. 00, but definitely not worth 32.00! Back they go.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Very durable for my 3, 5 y. o ...
customer_reviews.text: Very durable for my 3,5 y.o. No extras falling off of it,so my younger can play too,and I don't have to worry about them putting anything in the mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Zhanna

customer_reviews.title: I’m not sure how long the glitter in the dresses will last but if she’s happy I’m happy 🙂
customer_reviews.text: My six year old loves these! I’m not sure how long the glitter in the dresses will last but if she’s happy I’m happy 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Caryn

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this all the princes we made well she couldn’t wait to get them out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gannon

customer_reviews.title: So so pretty!
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous and a favorite of my girls!! Hold up well to little kid play.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: so awesome!! They arrived perfectly fine and are really ...
customer_reviews.text: so awesome!! They arrived perfectly fine and are really cute, shiny and marks-free. Not too small, not too big. Just the perfect size I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Krutika

customer_reviews.title: Great set of the group.. used as cake toppers with other sets
customer_reviews.text: Great set, used as cake toppers and they worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Martin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gift
customer_reviews.text: My four year old niece actually squealed when she opened this play set for her birthday. The figures are well detailed and the perfect size for my niece's age.
customer_reviews.author: A.L.B

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty. Well detailed.
customer_reviews.text: Hard plastic but grand daughter still liked playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hustus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and worked well on the cake and my daughter loves playing with them
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer AM

customer_reviews.title: These are really cute... a little flimsy ...
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute...a little flimsy at the waist...she will have to be careful not to snap them in half.
customer_reviews.author: mandyjo

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a gift for secret santa to charity. But cute in package.
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift for secret santa to charity. But cute in package.
customer_reviews.author: D Esposti

customer_reviews.title: They were perfect for a cake that I did recently
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect for a cake that I did recently. I only had to use certain princesses but they were perfect. Nicely painted and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Paulie

customer_reviews.title: Seems like the rest of the figures are decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Within 2 hours of my daughter opening these dolls the arm of Tiana promptly fell off. Amazon gave me a $2 discount. Seems like the rest of the figures are decent quality, but we shall see
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Pender

customer_reviews.title: Pretty set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful figurines. I just wish I would have seen them on Disney.com first they are only $24.99 with a few more dolls.
customer_reviews.author: L. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful for cake toppers
customer_reviews.text: These were beautiful and worked great for my daughter's cake!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Jensen

customer_reviews.title: princesses
customer_reviews.text: my child love these and still plays with them. we love our princesses.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved these, used them on her birthday cake. Great quality, very sparkly, not cheap looking at all.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Cute! A lot bigger than I expected them to be.
customer_reviews.author: Skye Smith

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old daughter loves these-so I can't complain ...
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter loves these-so I can't complain there, but the glitter on some of the princess dresses comes off and gets on things.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby O.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved them they were a great surprise for my 3year old granddaughter who loves her princesses
customer_reviews.author: SHERRI

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little figurines
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these things. Gotta be careful though some certain characters heads detach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The 3yr old girl I gave it - just loved it1
customer_reviews.author: Jean E. Setele

customer_reviews.title: they are perfect. They sit on top of the icing
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for cake toppers, then gave to my daughter to play with. As cake toppers, they are perfect. They sit on top of the icing, so no much clean up. As toddler (3yo) playthings, they are not great. Tiana has lost an arm and Arial's torso came lose from her body. Nothing a little glue can't fix, but still with they were a bit more durable. But I LOVE that Mulan is in the mix, since she's my daughter's current favorite princess.
customer_reviews.author: APres

customer_reviews.title: Worked out perfectly as cake topper for birthday cake
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use Snow White as a birthday cake topper for little girl. Worked out perfectly. The figurines are pretty substantial in weight (perhaps too substantial maybe, be careful of little ones throwing/dropping these on their feet) Wish there weren’t glitter on them but this is purely personal preference. The details on these figurines are more superior than ones marketed as cake toppers and daughter plays with the set often.
customer_reviews.author: Lolablu

customer_reviews.title: Glitterized Princesses - PERFECT for any craft project or just for your little Princess!
customer_reviews.text: Product exceeds all expectations. Absolutely fantastic product. Definitely something I'll buy again. I love EVERYTHING about these figurines. They are simply perfect for the craft project that I had in mind. They had just enough glitter on them to make it fantastic without overwhelming. I liked them so much. I went back and bought another set! Definitely recommend - Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: annie rayne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used these for 5 year old grand-daughter's birthday cake. She is still playing with them and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Caren

product_meta.title: Disney Princess Figure Play Set
product_meta.description: Get dolled up and ready for the ball with our Disney Princess Figurine Playset. Each lovely lady is dressed in a formal gown covered with sparkly glitter, ideal for her royal evening and happily ever after.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars114 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
